page.title: 15BURRINGTON CHILDREN
page.content: {MOTHER & TODDLER GROUP. The group was formed at Easter 1985 and has met at Burrington Methodist Church each Wednesday during the summer term from 2.15 to 3.45p.m. Eleven families from the parish have attended, the majority on a regular basis.The group is for all children of pre-school age, a total of 20 to date. Mothers stay with their children for the session and join in their play. There are refreshments, and a Teddy Bears'picnic was held on the last day. {YOUTH CLUB } The youth club use the facilities of the{parish hall:skittles,table tennis, {darts and pool table.} The number of members is about 20. Meetings are held every Saturday in the winter months .The members are in the 11_16 age range.
